belongs_to_collection.name: Cocky Boys' Big Bro, Little Bro Series

overview: What do Trenton Ducati, Colby Keller and others have in common? They're all big-dicked, power tops that always leave their eager bottoms begging for more. In Big Bro, Lil Bro you'll soon see how sexy it is when a big dude teaches his lil' bro the ropes and just fucks him without abandon.
title: Big Bro, Little Bro
